review: I am constantly searching for the best media playback device for my digital multimedia collection. The Fire TV stick plays media (Netflix and Plex Media Client) butter-smooth with an occasional hiccup that might be due to my wireless connection. I noticed that without an active Internet connection the Fire TV Stick is practically useless.
author: Christopher McIntosh
